about_the_game:
Retro Drive: The Soundtrack features synthwave and outrun songs curated and soundtracked by Outland Recordings from Retro Drive, which was originally released on 1 May 2020.

From the Legendary Synthwave Producers:
  • 80s Stallone
  • Fantom '87
  • Futurecop!
  • Highway Superstar
  • Lost Outrider
  • Michael Oakley
  • Neon Nox
  • New Arcades
  • Paradise Walk
  • Stilz
  • Sunglasses Kid

It’s time to buckle up and immerse yourself in the Retroverse!

name: Retro Drive: The Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 95 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 475 MB available space
